name: Be the Boss (itch) (Lpf-Game)
description:
You are the roboter-boss at the end of a dungeon. A earthquake destroyed you're home and there is big gape behind you. A falling rock destroyed you're chip for moving sideways and there is a lot of heroes coming towards you, and if they hit you, they will slowly but surely push you off. You need to protect yourself using ur laser and different traps, in a tower defense kinda way.

Hope you enjoy it :)
